math.alttext: \epsilon_{{{\bf p}}\sigma}=-2t(\cos p_{x}+\cos p_{y})-4t_{2}\cos p_{x}\cos p_{% y}-\mu+h\sigma,

math.alttext: h_{\rm c}=\max_{\scriptsize{{\bf q}}}{\Bigl{[}}\frac{\Delta_{\alpha 0}}{2}\exp% {\bigl{(}}-\int\frac{{\rm d}{p_{\parallel}}}{2\pi}\frac{\rho_{\perp}^{\alpha}(% 0,{p_{\parallel}})}{N_{\alpha}(0)}\log|1-\frac{{{{\bf v}}_{\rm F}}\cdot{{{\bf q% }}}}{2{h_{\rm c}}}|{\bigr{)}}{\Bigr{]}},
